overview: Under the viaduct that gives relief to the Route des Jeunes in Geneva, an epicenter of entertainment coexists with the dust that accumulates on abandoned vehicles. Depending on the day and time, there are skateboarders, hockey players, future bikers who slalom, or even young people who enjoy their cars. Youth is part of the history of this road from its construction in 1942 until today.
title: La Route des Jeunes
